page.title: 10An Average Day: Matthew (11)
page.content: I get up around 07:15, lie in bed and watch Breakfast TV for about 10 minutes, and get up and dress, go down- stairs to have breakfast, usually cereal, toast and coffee. By that time it's about 8:00. Then I go upstairs to get my outdoor clothes and bag. I ride my bike to school. Then I have a small break. Bell goes at 09:55 , then I have Assembly. Then I have English or Maths. At 10:30 till 11:00 I have a break. Then we have Maths or English till 12:00 when I have dinner till 12:30.I take sandwiches to school. Then play till 13:00. Then we might have Art, Science, Nature or project work. I go home at 15:00. I have a cup of tea. Then I either go out to play with friends or watch TV. I have dinner at 18:30. I read or watch TV till about 21:30 or later if there's a good program on.
